comic_aesthetic.name: Everpeak Citadel House Style
comic_aesthetic.description: High fantasy graphic novel with bold ink work and vibrant colors
comic_aesthetic.art_style: Bold ink line art, vibrant colors, dynamic composition, sequential art style, graphic novel quality.
comic_aesthetic.setting_tone: Medieval fantasy setting, high fantasy atmosphere.
comic_aesthetic.visual_quality: High detail, professional comic book illustration quality.
comic_aesthetic.lighting_notes: Dramatic fantasy lighting. Winter/snow contrasted with magical warmth. Each essence has distinct color coding.

dialogue_rendering.instruction: Include speech bubbles with dialogue text clearly readable.

bubble_types.thought: Cloud-style thought bubbles (indicated by 'thought bubble:' in dialogue)
bubble_types.sound_effects: Large bold lettering integrated into scene

composition_guidelines.character_focus: Characters should be clearly visible and identifiable
composition_guidelines.background_detail: Detailed environments that support but don't overwhelm characters
composition_guidelines.panel_flow: Clear visual flow supporting sequential storytelling

character_rendering.body_language: Character personality shown through posture and movement
character_rendering.equipment_accuracy: Consistent armor, clothing, and equipment details
